observation.output:
cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os
# Create the test case from the issue description
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
# Write to a temporary file
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
    temp_file = f.name
hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)
# Test FITSDiff on the same file
diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
print(f'FITSDiff identical: {diff.identical}')
if not diff.identical:
    print('BUG REPRODUCED: FITSDiff reports differences in identical file!')
    fits.printdiff(temp_file, temp_file)
else:
    print('No bug detected - files are correctly identified as identical')
# Clean up
os.unlink(temp_file)
"
FITSDiff identical: True
No bug detected - files are correctly identified as identical

from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os

# Create the test case from the issue description
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])

# Write to a temporary file
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
    temp_file = f.name

hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)

# Test FITSDiff on the same file
diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
print(f'FITSDiff identical: {diff.identical}')

if not diff.identical:
    print('BUG REPRODUCED: FITSDiff reports differences in identical file!')
    fits.printdiff(temp_file, temp_file)
else:
    print('No bug detected - files are correctly identified as identical')

# Clean up
os.unlink(temp_file)
"
